definition: Xuan Yuan, personal name of Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]

sentences.english: Silvery-blue Regulus may look pinkish in the twilight.

definition: honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
